mods.abstract: The King of France (ill) , Lafew, and Helena in All's Well That Ends Well Act 2 Scene 1. The London Printing and Publishing Company Limited London & New York.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT.
